gsw_content_information.article:
Typo handling corrects user search terms to match spellings found in the index. Configure settings for your search profile's auto-generated typo handling dictionary.
  1. Review typo handling settings for the default search profile by following these steps.
    1. Edit the search profile.
    2. In the Typo Handling related list, edit the dictionary.
    3. Examine the settings on the AI Search Dictionary form.
    4. Return to the search profile list by clicking the Back icon.
  2. Optionally, configure typo handling settings for your own search profiles by following these steps.
    1. Edit the search profile that you want to configure typo handling settings for.
    2. In the Typo Handling related list, edit the auto-generated dictionary.
    3. On the AI Search Dictionary form, fill in the Derive Settings fields.
      Indexed sources
      List of indexed sources whose searchable content AI Search uses to create the list of typo handling corrections.
      Auto refresh
      Interval in hours (minimum 24) for automatic refresh of derived typo handling corrections.
      Blocked fields
      Comma-separated list of names of indexed document fields that AI Search ignores when deriving typo handling corrections.
    4. To make the modified typo dictionary settings active, click Publish.
    5. To make the updated search profile settings take effect, click Publish.
gsw_content_information.title: Configure typo handling dictionaries
